Free"}.fa,.fas{font-weight:900} /*Custom CSS*/ @keyframes shimmer { 100% { transform: translateX(100%) } }
.searchx #form #submit { line-height: normal; }
.bigcontent .thumb { line-height: 0 }
.ts-breadcrumb ol li:not(:first-of-type)::before { content: '\203A'; margin-left: -4px; margin-right: 4px }
.slide-content .title { font-size: unset; }
.slide-content .rating { line-height: 150% }
.slide-content .ellipsis { font-size: 21px; }
.quickfilter .filters .filter.submit { float: left }
.h, .hpage a.h, .ts-breadcrumb ol li:empty, .bs .bsx .limit .status.Ongoing { display: none }
#readerarea .page { background: #222; overflow: hidden; border-radius: 3px; text-align: left; font-size: 17px; }
#readerarea .page p { margin: 20px 0; }
.bs.skeleton, .utao.skeleton { cursor: progress; -webkit-user-select: none; -moz-user-select: none; -ms-user-select: none; user-select: none; }
.bs.skeleton .sk, .utao.skeleton .sk { display: inline-block; height: 1em; position: relative; overflow: hidden; background-color: #16151d;
}
.lightmode .bs.skeleton .sk { background-color: #eef0f2; }
.sk::after { position: absolute; top: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; left: 0; transform: translateX(-100%); background-image: linear-gradient(90deg, #222 0, #16151d 20%, #16151d 60%, #222); animation: shimmer 2s infinite; content: ''; }
.lightmode .sk::after { background-image: (linear-gradient(90deg, #fff 0, #eef0f2 20%, #eef0f2 60%, #fff)); }
.skeleton .imgu.sk { width: 75px; }
.bs.skeleton .tt.sk { height: 38px; }
.bs.skeleton .adds.sk, .bs.skeleton .limit.sk, .bs.skeleton .tt.sk, .utao.skeleton .luf ul .sk, .utao.skeleton span.series.sk { width: 100%; }

.pagination span.page-numbers.current, .quickfilter .filters .filter.submit button, #sidebar .section .ts-wpop-series-gen .ts-wpop-nav-tabs li.active a, #gallery.owl-loaded .owl-dots .owl-dot.active span { background: #8b4513 !important }
#sidebar .section #searchform #searchsubmit, .series-gen .nav-tabs li.active a, .lastend .inepcx a, .nav_apb a:hover, #top-menu li a:hover, .readingnav.rnavbot .readingnavbot .readingbar .readingprogress, .lightmode .bigcontent .infox .wd-full .mgen a:hover, .lightmode .bxcl ul li .chbox:hover, .lightmode ul.taxindex li a:hover, .comment-list .comment-body .reply a:hover, .topmobile, .bxcl ul::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb, .lightmode .slider:before, .quickfilter .filters .filter .genrez::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background: #8b4513 }
.lightmode #sidebar .section h4, .lightmode .serieslist ul li .ctr, .listupd .utao .uta .luf ul li, .lightmode .bs .bsx:hover .tt, .soralist ul, a:hover, .lightmode .blogbox .btitle h3, .lightmode .blogbox .btitle h1, .bxcl ul li .lchx a:visited, .listupd .utao .uta .luf ul li a:visited, .lightmode .pagination a:hover, .lightmode a:hover, #sidebar .serieslist ul li .leftseries h2 a:hover, .bs.styletere .epxs, .bxcl ul li .dt a, .lightmode .bigcontent .infox .wd-full .mgen a, .lightmode #sidebar .serieslist ul li .leftseries h2 a:hover, .comment-list .comment-body .reply a, .bxcl ul li .eph-num a:visited, .headpost .allc a { color: #8b4513 }
.bxcl ul li .lchx a:visited, .listupd .utao .uta .luf ul li a:visited { color: #8b4513 !important }
.lightmode .serieslist ul li .ctr, .advancedsearch button.searchz, .lista a, .lightmode .lista a:hover, .blogbox .boxlist .bma .bmb .bmba, .page.blog .thumb, #sidebar .section #searchform #searchsubmit, .lightmode .bigcontent .infox .wd-full .mgen a, .lightmode .bxcl ul li .chbox:hover, .comment-list .comment-body .reply a { border-color: #8b4513 }
.hpage a:hover { color: #FFF !important; }
@media only screen and (max-width:800px) {
#readerarea .page { margin: 0 10px }
.lightmode.black .th, .lightmode .th, .th, .surprise { background: #8b4513 }
#main-menu { background: rgba(28, 28, 28, 0.95); } }
/*Loader*/ #page-loader { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100vh; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); z-index: 9999; }
.loader { position: relative; width: 140px; height: 140px; border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.137); background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.046); backdrop-filter: blur(60px); box-shadow: 2px 5px 10px #000; animation: 2s rotate ease infinite; }
@keyframes rotate { 0% { transform: rotate(0); }
100% { transform: rotate(360deg); } }
.square { position: absolute; width: 35px; height: 35px; border-radius: 5px; }
.square1 { top: 10px; left: 10px; background: red; animation: trans1 .4s infinite alternate; }
.square2 { top: 10px; right: 10px; background: blueviolet; animation: trans2 .4s infinite alternate; }
.square3 { bottom: 10px; left: 10px; background: green; animation: trans3 .4s infinite alternate; }
.square4 { bottom: 10px; right: 10px; background: yellow; animation: trans4 .4s infinite alternate; }
@keyframes trans1 { 0% { transform: translate(0); }
100% { transform: translate(45px, 45px); } }
@keyframes trans2 { 0% { transform: translate(0); }
100% { transform: translate(-45px, 45px); } }
@keyframes trans3 { 0% { transform: translate(0); }
100% { transform: translate(45px, -45px); } }
@keyframes trans4 { 0% { transform: translate(0); }
100% { transform: translate(-45px, -45px); } }
.totop { position: fixed; background-color: #8b4513; padding: .75rem 1.25rem; border-radius: 100px; cursor: pointer; border: none; bottom: 8rem; right: 1rem; height: 2.5rem; opacity: 0; visibility: hidden; width: 2.5rem; transform: translateZ(0); -webkit-transform: translateZ(0); transition: all .3s ease; }
.totop::after { content: ''; position: fixed; border: 2px solid #fff; border-radius: 100px; bottom: 0; display: block; right: 0; height: calc(2.5rem - 10px); margin: auto; padding: 0; left: 0; top: 0; width: calc(2.5rem - 10px); }
.totop svg { position: absolute; height: 1.5rem; width: 1.5rem; bottom: 0; right: 0; margin: auto; min-height: 1.5rem; min-width: 1.5rem; left: 0; top: 0; }
.totop svg path { fill: #fff; }
.totop.tampil { bottom: 2rem; opacity: 1; visibility: visible; z-index: 9999; }
.live-search-item { position: fixed; z-index: 9999; background: #222; }
.lightmode .live-search-item { background: #fff }
.live-search-item p { text-align:center }
.live-search-item center { padding: 10px }
.live-search-item ul { list-style: none; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
.live-search-item li { font-family: inherit; padding: 10px; border-bottom: 1px solid #383838; overflow: hidden; }
.lighmode .live-search-item li { border-color: #ececec }
.live-search-item a { display: block }
.live-search-thumb { margin-right: 10px; float: left; width: 40px; height: 60px; overflow: hidden; padding-bottom: 0; box-sizing: content-box; }
.live-search-item .over { overflow: hidden; float: right; width: calc(100% - (40px + 10px)); box-sizing: content-box; }
.over .autotitle { font-size: .95em; font-weight: 500; margin-bottom: 3px; white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidde; text-overflow: ellipsis; }
.live-search-item span { display: block; color: #999; margin-bottom: 2px; font-size: 12px; overflow: hidden; }
.lightmode .live-search-item span { color: #888 }
.live-search-item span i { display: inline-block; margin: 2px 5px; width: 4px; height: 4px; background: #777; border-radius: 50%; }
.mrgn .pagination { padding: 15px 0 10px; margin: 0 }
